name: Joshua
text: Truly 5 stars today! The pizza was a great deal, ready on time, and tasted amazing. They even have a drive thru so you don't have to waste time getting out of your car. I call them like I see them and this was a great experience!

name: Leslie Deed
text: For a chain its not terrible. Not great, but cheap and decent.

name: Roxana Perez
text: I don't like to complain but the burnt pizza I received today was not OK. There have been a few times now that my pizza was not made how I ordered it but this was seriously not ok. I called and they did send me a new one but still how can you think delivering a burnt pizza is OK??

name: Terri McDonal
text: It was very busy and they didn't give me a whole pizza I was supposed to get. When my friend called she was told it was too busy to make it now and just kept making excuses for "the new guy." I appreciate the fact that he was new but stop …More

name: Lester Marszalek
text: Nice location good service.

name: Jay Locher
text: Pizza showed up 45 minutes too early and ruined dinner, thanks for nothing, can't even get an answer why?

name: Silvana Corsetti
text: I ordered a large cheese pizza online and an order of mozzarella sticks. It was estimated to arrive by delivery in 55-60 minutes. The delivery guy finally arrived with my order about 85 minutes later. He apologized and said the driver’s car …More

name: Dick Longmire
text: Live in Channahon near this Pizza Hut but go elsewhere because they don't participate in the same deals.

name: Danielle Delaney
text: Ordered food for delivery. When the delivery driver showed up she dropped half of my food on the ground, did not even bring everything I ordered. I called the store spoke with the manager, Who told me that they could not refund me for the …More

name: Steve Frediriko
text: Do not order from this place!!! Ordered from here 2 times in 3 weeks and they got my order wrong both times.....ether they mess up your order or they forget the pop(soda) and sauces that you paid extra for..the people that take your order …More

name: Jane Smithe
text:
Nice pizza place. Staff very friendly. Great pizza and good deals.
Will come here again.

name: Lanese Smith
text: Went in for a $5 power lunch..guy who took my order was super nice. Food was hot and delicious definitely hit the hunger spot...

name: Ado Beganovic
text: Been waiting for my food for 2 hours now and I keep calling and they “transfer” me to someone and I’m out on hold for forever then I have to hang up and call again and I’ve already paid with my card.....never got the food but they kept the money

name: Michael Chalifoux
text: Vile, disgusting, rude employees. Terrible management. Awful food prep. Have literally NEVER had a positive experience here. Avoid this place completely.

name: Nick Hahn
text: They left me on the phone for more than 20 minutes!!!! That's is ridiculous!!!

name: Justin Osborne
text: Not bad but Pizza hut has definitely went down in quality. It's getting too generic.

name: Brandi Backulich
text: Manager was rude and said they can't deliver to our home anymore, we're 15 minutes away if that. WOW! And we always tip well! Will never get our business again even if we're in town.

name: maggie
text: 2 hours and 15 mins and pizza still hasn't arrived. Never will I order from this location again.  DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE.

name: TRUTH SAYER
text: The total for my carryout order was $14.99 and I used my credit card to pay it. Days later when the charge finally posted, it was for $21.99!!!!! THAT'S $7.00 OVER WHAT I LEGALLY AUTHORIZED MY CARD TO BE CHARGED FOR!!! THIS COMPANY …More

name: Knight-Time
text: I googled address and I am literally 796 Feet away... they will NOT deliver to me. SMH. Makes laugh because i used to deliver pizza and I always tip $10-$20. I guess they hate money lol.

name: Ryan Harris
text: This location is very fast with orders and they are usually great with fixing issues and with customer service. Be ware: if you order a pizza that's half: half with toppings, the toppings will never be layered properly in separate halves.

name: Arunkumar Trivedi
text:
Last night i order two large piza on line two toppings
The size of piza was smaller.2.5 inch of border doe was left without sauce  and cheese. I was piza hut lovers but last night piza cutting corners for savings. I don'ty appreciate  .

name: Jacquelyn Pifer
text: This store needs to be shut down. Food is always burnt and the employees and management are rude and and couldnt care less. I know of many people who have gone to corporate to complain. And I will be too.

name: Merkin The Mage
text: Delivery guy didn't even know the price of my food. My pizza was trashed it didn't even look like a pizza. Don't order from here

name: mike sellars
text: I don't remember visiting pizza hut yesterday. I can't get enough stuff crust.

name: Sean Barrett
text: Steady decline in quality and when called about situation, manager on duty passed blame on earlier manager.   Buy from local  non food chain pizza places and get something at least edible.

name: Evie
text: Friendly service. Understaffed

name: Lauren Elizabeth
text: i ordered hot wings and fries and they just gave me 2 orders of fries

name: Charnese Fletcher
text: Manager was plain rude to me on the phone

name: Alex Rubertus
text: Waited 1.5 hours for pizza to be delivered only to call and find out my order had been delayed for lack of ingredients. They will no longer recieve my business

name: Michelle Tarrant-Williams
text: It's Pizza hut. Nothing fancy but quality food.

name: LAURA WELLS
text: Get what you pay for

name: Michael Tyne
text: Really bad . pizza was do bad I threw it out.

name: mike
text: Usually always good.

name: Cbas Swanson
text: Always gets the order right
